name: H-O Products Corporation 15# PVC Glazing Tape
description: 15# PVC Glazing Tape is a medium density, closed cell polyvinyl chloride foam with an aggressive, pressure - sensitive acrylic adhesive (A3) on both sides and a 84# poly - coated brown kraft liner. Economical alternative to BGT glazing tape. A3 adhesive provides an excellent combination of tack and holding power. Bonds quickly to most surfaces that are kept clean, dry and free of contamination.
